Is It Ever Okay For Straight Actors To Play Queer Roles?

There is a question that’s been asked to death in recent years, as Hollywood reckons with the representation and diversity problems that have long plague

title: That Oscars Meme Made Jennifer Garner Want To Punch Something

meta_data.title: Jennifer Garner Doesnt Know What Her Oscar Face Meant
meta_data.description: Garner is just as clueless as we are. "I wish I had a better story," she told Ellen Degeneres.
